channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
channel.desc: Grow Webs Grow/Rio in Space. A monster takes over the city. Rio goes into space.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Paddling Pool. Children's animation. Bing and Sula are disappointed that there is no water in the paddling pool, until Bing realises that there are new games they can play.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yakka Dee!
channel.desc: Treasure. Dee encourages a friend to say 'treasure', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of treasure - gold treasure, sunken treasure and yummy treat treasure.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Lu & the Bally Bunch
channel.desc: Play Date. Lu fails to realise that Biba is scared by a game that they are playing together.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piggy Builders
channel.desc: Camping Badges. The Piggies help Keith and Rebecca earn their camping badges.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Twirlywoos
channel.desc: Connecting. Stop-motion preschool programme. The Twirlywoos watch a boy tie his shoelace at a bus stop and decide to connect his shoelaces to the shoes of the other passengers.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Hide-and-Seek. Ben meets his new friends at the park for a game of hide-and-seek. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble and Grandad get into a muddle.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Wake Up Time! Preschool series. Po needs an extra snooze before waking up for an energetic Tubby Phone dance.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Baby Club
channel.desc: Bag. Giovanna and Baby Bear invite babies and their grown-ups to explore bags through discovery, play, song and story.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie & Triggs
channel.desc: Glug Jug. Maddie accidentally breaks a piece of pottery that Mum made. Instead of doing the right thing and owning up to it, she starts to worry about how badly everything will go.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dylan's Playtime Adventures
channel.desc: Airport Worker. Dylan the airport worker wants to help travellers catch their flights. So when a suitcase rolls away, he needs to find it and bring it back before the plane takes off.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Kiri and Lou
channel.desc: Who Is Sleepy Now? Kiri and Lou can't sleep. Pania says she will sing them a song, but only if they stay awake for the whole thing.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vegesaurs
channel.desc: Top of the Pops. Ginger and the baby Pea-Rexes help a young Cornasaurolophus reach the top of a volcano.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Shaun. Dad transforms his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Bridge Badge. It's bridge building time! The Squirrels help a quarreling group of Gerbils sort out their longstanding disagreement.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Playtime Towers
channel.desc: Snail. Bella and Lift visit the Fortress of Fun, where Kingsley and Queenie have a snail slime race. But who will win, Team King or Team Queen.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Time for School
channel.desc: Miss Gerrard's Birthday. It's Miss Gerrard's birthday, and the children plan a surprise party for her.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Cook Little Cook
channel.desc: Dylan the Dinosaur. Jen and Small are having a sleepover, but Small doesn't have a toothbrush that's her size.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: What's in Your Bag?
channel.desc: Rabbanit. Ramie, who is a rabbanit, tells us all about her ram's horn shofar and why she loves to hear the sound it makes.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dog Squad
channel.desc: Mission: No Dogs Allowed. Charli is meeting her friend Annabel for lunch at the local caf?. But Tinks needs all her big dog energy to help Charli persuade the owner to let them in.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie's Do You Know?
channel.desc: Sleeping Bag and Mattress. Maddie goes camping to find out how sleeping bags work and uses a special camera to learn how mattresses are made up of layers of foam and material.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yakka Dee!
channel.desc: Lion. Preschool series about words. Dee encourages a friend to say 'lion', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure, seeing what lions look like and what they do.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Numberblocks
channel.desc: The Rolling Sixes. Join the Six Times Table in a game show to work out who the Rolling Sixes are. The start and end are easy, but can she figure out the friends in the middle.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Alphablocks
channel.desc: In. The adventures of 26 lively letters who can make words come to life by holding hands. I holds hands with N and they find themselves stuck inside a floating balloon.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Wonderblocks
channel.desc: Potted Plant Parade. Toad needs another potted plant for the flower show after he drops the first one - it needs eight flowers on it for the competition.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: Choosing Colours. Red and Blue choose colours for their playhouses. Learn about making colour choices.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Radio Badge. The Squirrels find some of Duggee's radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yukee
channel.desc: The Beat in Your Feet. The garden gang compete in a three-legged race. Stripes struggles until he finds his three-legged rhythm.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Vehicles. Educational series using Makaton sign language. Mr Tumble goes on a surprise bus journey with his family, while Justin and his friends go on a boat adventure.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Roundy Round. Preschool series. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po do a roundy round dance and watch children in Tummy Tales ride a carousel which goes round and round too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Vida's New Helpers. When Popcorn gets sick, Fergie and Kipp offer to help Vida out in the clinic. But their competitive natures get in the way of them working together.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Game Catchers
channel.desc: A Few Dinos Too Many! The Game Catchers find themselves on a Beachy Planet and learn to play the game pour and fill. They need to be creative when making more materials for the game.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
channel.desc: Harris's Hawk and Leafcutter Ant. Steve and Aneeshwar meet the incredible Harris's hawk and clever leafcutter ants.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle's Paint Disaster. Preschool comedy drama series. The Brooklyn-Bells decorate Doug's bedroom. Waffle causes a green paint disaster and escapes into Mrs Hobbs's house next door.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Topsy and Tim
channel.desc: Wide Awake. Live-action children's show. It's the night before Topsy and Tim move house, and Kerry's parents arrive for a farewell dinner party with Mummy and Dad.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Love Monster
channel.desc: Jam Session Day. Bad Idea Puppy is at Love Monster's house to jam but gets locked in his bathroom. When Love Monster tries to get him out through the window, he gets locked in too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Mystery of the Longfin Eels. Some baby longfin eels vanish, prompting the Octonauts to investigate the mystery.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: When Dad Got the Hiccups. Dad gets a severe case of Proximan hiccups. Big Lizard and Cosima do their best to help, but their attempt to scare Dad goes wrong when a real 'monster' turns up.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Pea's Power Suit. Evil Pea wears a giant suit so powerful it knocks Supertato across the supermarket aisles. Carrot and Supertato plan to outsmart Evil Pea so she'll lose her new powers.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The News Badge. After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Peter Rabbit
channel.desc: The Tale of the Amazing Mum. Mr Tod and Sammy Whiskers team up to strike the rabbits' big picnic.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dog Squad
channel.desc: Mission: Sleepover. Diesel's super ears investigate a strange noise that interrupts Rayane's sleepover party.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Happy Happy Valentines. Mojo and Bo have to deliver a superfun singing valentine. But the problem is, they don't know who it's for, or who it's from. Preston is racing to beat them to it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Family Meeting. When Dad's accused of 'fluffing' in Bluey's face, Mum calls a meeting to settle the matter.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Swim School. Pleasing Big Fish class instructor Margaret is proving difficult for Mum, Dad and Bingo.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: Flutter's Honour. Pancake saves Flutter, who vows to repay him, but his behaviour drives Pan to distraction.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Football Fantastics
channel.desc: The Zen Den. Sophie must infiltrate the sports hall without disturbing a relaxation class Val is running. Her aim is to retrieve bibs, goals and a big bag of footballs.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Helpful Waffle. Waffle tries to help his friend Pepper find a new owner.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: The Meteor Shower. Oona and her friends get ready to watch the shooting stars.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Visit a Castle. JoJo and Gran Gran visit a castle. Can JoJo find secret treasure just like Captain Chloe.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Let's Have a Race! Moon Baby, Pepi Nana and all the friends find a toy roundabout has been left in the Toy House. Each chooses a vehicle to ride in and they have a race.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: The Wols. Stop-motion animation. The Iron Chicken offers to look after Mother Wol's three little Wols without realising they can be quite the handful.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: The Prettiest Flower. Upsy Daisy wants to look at flowers, but Igglepiggle wants to ride in the Ninky Nonk. Followed by Hushabye Lullabye.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Alice Dearing - Tomorrow I'll Be Brave. Swimmer Alice Dearing reads Tomorrow I'll Be Brave, by Jessica Hische.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: This Is CBeebies
channel.desc: This Is CBeebies. Programmes start at 6.00am.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Baby Jake
channel.desc: Baby Jake Loves Tickle Toes. The adventures of magical Baby Jake and friends. Baby Jake and Sydney the Monkey go on a tropical adventure and play tickling.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: UFO. Mojo and Bo only wanted to help fix a satellite dish with Mojo's chopper top. Now they've been mistaken for a UFO, and the whole town is in a tizzy about invading aliens.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Hide-and-Seek. Bing did not go to the toilet before the game of hide-and-seek started, and now he has to decide whether to give up his hiding place or try to hold on.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Love Monster
channel.desc: Picnic Night. A mysterious giant bunny delays the night-time picnic.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Dewey Dragon. Preston is in costume as everyone's favourite character, Dewey Dragon, but he isn't ready for how demanding Dewey's fans are. Mojo and Bo need to help him escape the crowd.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Chuggington
channel.desc: The Zephie Express. Zephie attaches to a turbo car in an attempt to be faster than Koko.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vegesaurs
channel.desc: The Great Race. Ginger races the Baby Pea-Rexes around Vegesaur Valley to the water hole.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
channel.desc: Rumble in the Jungle. Stop-frame animation featuring Raa Raa, who lives in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. When Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy, Zebby is upset and runs off to hide.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Super Sandcastle. Supertato and the Veggies have built a super sandcastle, but Evil Pea wants to storm it by firing her hordes of Mini Peas at it with her pea shooter.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Fireworks. Children's animation series. Sula and Amma go round to Bing's house to watch the fireworks, and Bing thinks he is brave enough to watch the fireworks from the garden.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Charlie Did It. Bing teaches Charlie how to throw but accidentally knocks the fruit over.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Comedy Badge. Animated preschool series. When Tag hurts his knee, the Squirrels decide laughter is the best medicine. But how will they make Tag laugh.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Singing Badge. Animated preschool series. Duggee and the Squirrels go for a walk in the countryside. It's tiring, but if they sing a song, they'll be back before they know it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Mariana Trench, the Pacific Ocean. Lars dives deep to save a Grimbot in the Mariana Trench, the deepest trench in our oceans.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Peter Rabbit
channel.desc: The Tale of Benjamin's Blunder. Animated series. When Peter realises he has accidentally upset Benjamin, he goes to apologise, only to find his cousin has gone.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Octonauts and the Sunfish. Preschool animation. The Octonauts must help a giant sunfish who can't swim straight, before it hurts other sea creatures and itself.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Mojo Draws the Line. Mojo and Bo were supposed to paint fresh lines on the street. But when they get into a race with Tao, the paint goes in every direction, causing wild traffic chaos.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Football Fantastics
channel.desc: The Zen Den. Sophie must infiltrate the sports hall without disturbing a relaxation class Val is running. Her aim is to retrieve bibs, goals and a big bag of footballs.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Imaginary Journey. Educational series using Makaton sign language. All aboard for a steam train adventure with Justin and his friends, while Mr Tumble zooms off into space.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Daddy Putdown. When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Pizza Girls. The kids are delivering mud pizzas to the grown-ups, but their pedal car keeps breaking.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Show and Tell Badge. Animated preschool series. Duggee has something really interesting to show at the clubhouse. Can the Squirrels find some other interesting things to share.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Rocking Horse Badge. Animated preschool series. Duggee is tidying when he comes across his old rocking horse, Bucky. The Squirrels help mend Bucky and in return get to ride him.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: Brinicle's Bestaurant. Brinicle tries to turn the Krispy Krill into a top restaurant, with disastrous results.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: A Place to Sleep. A playful Big Lizard accidentally breaks his own bath bed. Where will he sleep now.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Niagara Falls, Canada and USA. Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure! Glitch blocks Niagara Falls to give Grim HQ a mud bath. Can the Go Jetters fix the glitch.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Sydney Opera House, Australia. Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure! Glitch turns the Opera House into an opera boat to enter a race around Sydney Harbour.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
channel.desc: Robo-Spideys/Saber-Toothed Kitten. Team Spidey faces robot copies. Black Cat transforms.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Iguazu Falls. The Octonauts must clear a logjam while protecting a family of birds.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Tato Tower Takeover. Evil Pea and the Mini Peas take over the Tato Tower HQ and lock Supertato out.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Pfffirates
channel.desc: My Friend Richie. Pat runs into Richie and starts hanging out with him, upsetting Stede and Lily.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dylan's Playtime Adventures
channel.desc: Florist. Dylan the florist wants to make the best bouquet ever. But when one of his customers wants the rarest flower in the world, Dylan and his friends must go on a flower expedition.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dog Squad
channel.desc: Mission: Bus Ride. Disability assistance dog Tinks needs all her super fetch skills and big dog energy as she helps Charli catch a bus to meet her friend Lydia, who is getting married.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: My World Kitchen
channel.desc: Ameliya's Trinidadian Pepper Roti. Ameliya is making roti: dough filled with colourful carrot, cheese, pepper and spinach.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
channel.desc: Andy and the Darkling Beetle. Andy heads to the Namib desert in Africa to discover how a darkling beetle drinks water. Along the way, he shrinks down and meets a Namaqua chameleon.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Stinkano. Mojo and Bo need to clear out Swoppiton before Preston's smelly sandwich 'stinkplodes'.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Castle Badge. Animated preschool series. The Squirrels hear an echoing voice coming from the top of a castle's spooky tower. Someone is calling them - but who is it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: The Whale Shark. Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his band of explorers. Dashi is swallowed by a whale shark so the Octonauts venture inside to rescue her.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Vida's Happy Vet Day. When Zigzag hurts her foot on the job, Vida is there to help fix it. But Zigzag still has to deliver her packages in time for Vida's surprise Vet Day party.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Bird Migration, Spain and Morocco. Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure! It's an aerial adventure above Gibraltar as the team follow a group of migrating birds.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Whistler Mountain, Canada. Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure! Glitch causes a cable car catastrophe on Whistler Mountain in Canada.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Love Monster
channel.desc: Shooting Star Night. A group of fireflies accidentally spoil Love Monster's stargazing garden party when their light makes it too bright for everyone to see the stars in the night sky.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yukee
channel.desc: Lost and Found. Stripes has written a brilliant song, but his guitar string is broken, so he can't play it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Roots and Fruits
channel.desc: Raspberry. Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Raspberry performing It's Cool to Be Kind.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Colours. Educational series using Makaton sign language. Mr Tumble accidentally paints a rainbow, while Justin and his friends put on a colourful show at a theatre.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Cook Little Cook
channel.desc: Maverick Mouse. Jen and Small are having a movie night, but Jen has forgotten to buy some treats.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Playtime Towers
channel.desc: Star. Bella and Lift are visited by a shining star and set off to explore the floors of Playtime Towers. The first stop is Sketch in Boxtropolis - what will she be making today.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Back to the Pond. The puffin family enjoy a night-time adventure with a friendly frog.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Nick Cope's Popcast
channel.desc: Whole Lotta Fun. Today is the Popavision Song Contest, and Nick asks the Popcast Planners to help him come up with an idea for the song.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Postman Pat
channel.desc: A Speedy Car. Animation. Pat has to deliver a new remote-controlled car to Bill's party, but the car is accidentally switched on and zooms away across Pencaster.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: The Wishing Tree. Nugget tries to make her friends' 'wishing tree' dreams come true but gets in a muddle.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Chicken Translator. Henny Feathers' chickens aren't laying eggs, so Andy and the Band devise a cracking plan.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Justin's House
channel.desc: Cat's New Job. Justin, Robert and Little Monster are excited to sit down in front of the TV because their neighbour Cat has a new job as the Justin Town newsreader.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: Silly Colouring. The Colourblocks discover that it can be fun to colour things wrong. Learn about choosing colours with the Colourblocks.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Magic Hands
channel.desc: The Lady of Shalott. Children's sign language poetry series. Aimee and Ashley are off to a land of knights and castles with The Lady of Shalott by Alfred, Lord Tennyson.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Love Monster
channel.desc: Babysitting Day. Love Monster looks after a baby koala for the day and experiences all the ups and downs of parenthood as he tries to keep her happy.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Sweetieland Saga. Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Cafe. Bluey learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Big Lizard's Big Itch. Big Lizard isn't happy in his skin! Cosima tries everything to stop him scratching until she realises that's exactly what he needs to do. He's shedding his skin.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Nikhil & Jay
channel.desc: Nikhil and Jay and the Anniversary. When Nikhil and Jay try to help Appa and Amma surprise each other for the anniversary of their first date, things quickly get out of hand.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Swim Underwater. JoJo and her cousin Lexi are learning how to swim underwater - but it's a little bit tricky. It's time for a Gran Gran plan.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Dinner at Bernie's. Oona helps Bernie impress his lady friend, Bernadette, with a delicious meal.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Sarah & Duck
channel.desc: Dewy Morning. Animation for preschool children. Sarah and Duck are so keen to visit the art shop, they get there too early and have to find things to keep themselves entertained.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Charlie and Lola
channel.desc: Say Cheese. Children's animation. Siblings Charlie and Lola deal with topics that affect their everyday lives. Lola is determined to stay clean and tidy for her school photograph.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Find the Eclipse. Stop-motion animation. The Clangers gather to watch a solar eclipse, but as the moon moves towards the sun, the Iron Chicken's nest blocks the view.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: BeddyByes
channel.desc: Where's Yummy? MeMo and BaBa have fun spotting the Yummies - who are popping up everywhere today. The friends learn that their fun game is actually a hunt for Yummy Dog, who is missing.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Makka Pakka's Trumpet Makes a Funny Noise. Series for young children about a magical place. Igglepiggle and Upsy Daisy visit Makka Pakka and discover a stone stuck in his trumpet.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Rob Delaney - Ten in the Bed. A story read by a special guest. Rob Delaney reads and signs a Bedtime Story about ten cuddly friends trying to go to bed.
